page.title: 20Thorney Fens, Part 2
page.content: When asked what, if anything, made them come into Thorney during {holiday-times}or{week-ends, shopping was the main reason given. Those that lived nearest the village occasionally cycled in to{play}with their friends, but none of them came in to the {library.}Visits to the{doctor}were the only other reason. The{dykes}were the main playground of the children, with some enjoying playing in the{fields. Most of them have brothers or sisters to play with, or another youngster within a mile or two of their house. The one advantage they all agreed on was that it was{peaceful! {************************************** {*}These pages have been completed by{* {* Class 7 * {* Duke of Bedford School, * {* Thorney * {**************************************
